Replace.Text: Select City-States that will receive priority placement.
Choose and/or prioritize which City-States may appear on the map.
Click here to cycle through selected, prioritized, and deselected states for this City-State. Click the appropriate checkbox to directly (de)select or (de)prioritize it.

When checked, this City-State will be considered for placement at game start.[NEWLINE]When unchecked, it will be added to the exclusion list and will [COLOR_RED]NOT[ENDCOLOR] be considered.[NEWLINE]Exclusion and prioritization are mutually exclusive.[NEWLINE]Selection does not guarantee placement; the slider value is respected.

When checked, this City-State will be added to the priority list. At game start, items in the priority list will be considered [COLOR_Blue]BEFORE[ENDCOLOR] other selections.[NEWLINE]When unchecked, it will be considered according to the status of its selection box.[NEWLINE]Prioritization and exclusion are mutually exclusive.[NEWLINE]Priority does not guarantee placement; the slider value is respected.
